result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tony R. Rootes

defendant.name: Rootes, Tony R.
defendant.address: 7942 St Pats Church Road, Greenleaf, WI 54126

records.addlTxt:
1:33 PM/RM 301. Defendant Tony R. Rootes appeared by video, in custody in Langlade County Jail.  Attorney John Zich in court for Tony R. Rootes.  Attorney Kelly Hays in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Atty Zich has received a copy of the criminal complaint, waives reading, reserves rights, notes Def. has waived time limits for P.H. Atty Zich requests Status Conference. Bond continues.
Status conference scheduled for January 23, 2023 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
3:55 PM Defendant Tony R. Rootes appeared by video, in custody in Langlade County Jail.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Court reviews case history. Def. has contacted PD Office and is waiting for a response. Court orders Def. to follow up with PD Office. Def. continues to wish for counsel. Court reviews Def. right to a P.H. Court asks if Def. wishes to waive time limits on P.H. Def. confirms and wishes to waive time limits. Court accepts waiver of time limits on P.H. and finds good cause to go past time limits. Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

No illegal use or possession of controlled substances.
No contact with codefendants Amber Roehl and Kevin Alloway.

2:14 PM Defendant Tony R. Rootes appeared by video, in custody in Langlade County Jail.  Attorney Elizabeth R. Gebert in court for State of Wisconsin, via zoom. Def. has copy of complaint, advised of charges and penalties.  Def. given Atty rights and given 4 options, PD, hire own, court appointed Atty. or represent self. State makes bail bond recommendations and notes Def. has lengthy record and is currently on supervision. State requests a $3,000.00 cash bond with conditions of No illegal use or possession of controlled substances and no contact with codefendants Amber Roehl and Kevin Alloway. Def. makes bail bond argument. Court considers bail bond factors and orders a $3,000.00 cash bond with conditions of No illegal use or possession of controlled substances and no contact with codefendants Amber Roehl and Kevin Alloway.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
